Headline: #49 Western Temporary Reroute at Western/Harrison
ShortDescription: 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Harrison, Oakley, Polk and Western: due to, police activity near Western/Harrison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Harrison, Oakley, Polk and Western: due to, police activity near Western/Harrison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays Affecting O'Hare Bound Blue Line Trains
ShortDescription: O'Hare Bound Blue Line trains are running with delays & congestion after earlier equipment problems near Oak Park. Crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare Bound Blue Line trains are running with delays & congestion after earlier equipment problems near Oak Park.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Crews are working to clear the congestion and restore normal travel times through the area.

Allow extra travel time.
